title: Rancher Shares #1 Key to Ranching Success

tasks.task: Determine the species of grass and manage rotational grazing.
subtasks: Rotate pastures to favor desirable grass species.
Educate oneself about rotational grazing benefits.
Compare current carrying capacity to previous.

tasks.task: Prevent snakes from entering the house.
subtasks: Create barriers to deter snakes near the house.
Seal potential entry points for snakes.
Replace or repair damaged fencing as needed.
